This is the new face of your friend-He is now reborn a girl.  At this stage in the movie, you are full of questions, and wonder what the rules of incarnation are. 
You ask everyone if they've seen that person.  Someone tells you that they have seen her at a hospital. You search every nearby hospital. 
Suddenly, you hear the woman's voiceover-"They will come to you when they are ready!"

You snap out of the film. This was a very engaging movie, and everyone is talking with each other about what will happen next. 
"In theaters next Spring", flash the words.  You sigh.  You have so many questions, but will have to wait. until next have them answered. 
you head outside, pondering the implications of everything you've seen.

The End.
